org.codebuilder.template
Class TemplateConverter

java.lang.Object
  org.codebuilder.template.TemplateConverter
public class TemplateConverter
extends java.lang.Object

Manages the exess whitespace produced by Velocity. Provides methods that parse a template file and create a copy of it but with the whitespace handled

Title: Velocity Filter

Description: Filter for whitespace handling in Velocity templates

Copyright: Copyright (c) 2004

Company: Generative Technologies

Version:
1.0
Author:
Dimitrios Kolovos
